analysis.description: Linkbox.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#333-337) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol:
	Contract Linkbox has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#162)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Linkbox.claimToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#328-333) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#332)

Linkbox.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#333-337)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0x59217d3e1daebbeb89a8d92e4ee0e936bf5e7f93.sol#336-337
